text.tspan: L0VE TALKING TO PE0PLE!! usually when im not busy I like starting and having convos with people, so I yap a lot sometimes!!
lmk if ur busy or u dont wanna talk, im chill w that too!
I AM 0FTEN VERY BUSY TH0UGH, if I leave your whisper on read it's probably because of that!! :(
0THER THAN THAT, FEEL FREE TO WHISPER!
